Verses: 1 andriyum, Sagodharare, Neengal Inninna Piragaaramaai Nadakkavum, Dhevanukkup Piriyamaayirukkavum Vendumendru, Neengal Engalaal Kettu Etrukkondapadiye, Adhigamadhigamaaith Therumpadikku,karththaraagiya Yesuvukkul Ungalai Vendikkondu Puththisollugirom.
2 karththaraagiya Yesuvinaale Naangal Ungalukkuk Koduththa Kattalaigalai Arindhirukkireergale.
3 neengal Parisuththamullavargalaagavendumenbadhe Dhevanudaiya Siththamaayirukkiradhu. Andhappadi, Neengal Vesimaarkkaththukku Vilagiyirundhu,
5 ungalil Avanavan Thanthan Sareerapaandaththaip Parisuththamaayum Ganamaayum Aandukollumpadi Arindhu:

6 indha Vishayaththil Oruvanum Meeraamalum Than Sagodharanai Vanjiyaamalum Irukkavendum; Munname Naangal Ungalukku Solli, Saatchiyaaga Echchariththapadiye Ippadippatta Vishayangalellaavatraiyunguriththuk Karththar Needhiyai Sarikkattugiravaraayirukkiraar.
8 aagaiyaal Asattaipannugiravan Manusharai Alla, Thamadhu Parisuththa Aaviyai Namakkuth Thandharulina Dhevanaiye Asattaipannugiraan.
9 sagodhara Sinegaththaikkuriththu Naan Ungalukku Ezhudhavenduvadhillai; Neengal Oruvariloruvar Anbaayirukkumpadikku Dhevanaal Podhikkappattavargalaayirukkireergale.
10 andhappadi Neengal Makkedhoniyaa Naadengumulla Sagodhararellaarukkum Seydhuvarugireergal. Sagodharare, Anbile Neengal Innum Adhigamaaip Perugavum;
11 purambeyirukkiravargalaippatri Yokkiyamaai Nadandhu, Ondrilum Ungalukkuk Kuraivillaadhirukkumpadikku,

12 naangal Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Amaidhalullavargalaayirukkumpadi Naadavum, Ungal Sondha Aluvalgalaip Paarkkavum, Ungal Sondhak Kaigalinaale Velaiseyyavum Vendumendru Ungalukkup Buththisollugirom.
13 andriyum, Sagodharare, Niththiraiyadaindhavargalinimiththam Neengal Nambikkaiyatravargalaana Matravargalaip Polath Dhukkiththu, Arivillaadhirukka Enakku Manadhillai.
14 yesuvaanavar Mariththu Pinbu Ezhundhirundhaarendru Visuvaasikkirome; Appadiye Yesuvukkul Niththiraiyadaindhavargalaiyum Dhevan Avarodekoodak Konduvaruvaar.
15 karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyai Munnittu Naangal Ungalukku Sollugiradhaavadhu: Karththarudaiyavarugaimattum Uyirodirukkum Naam Niththiraiyadaindhavargalukku Mundhikkolvadhillai.

16 enenil, Karththar Thaame Aaravaaraththodum, Piradhaana Thoodhanudaiya Saththaththodum, Dheva Ekkaalaththodum Vaanaththilirundhu Irangivaruvaar; Appozhudhu Kiristhuvukkul Mariththavargal Mudhalaavadhu Ezhundhiruppaargal.
17 pinbu Uyirodirukkum Naamum Karththarukku Edhirkondupoga Mekangalmel, Avargalodekooda Aagaayaththil Eduththukkollappattu, Ivvidhamaai Eppozhudhum Karththarudanekooda Iruppom.
18 aagaiyaal, Indha Vaarththaigalinaale Neengal Oruvaraiyoruvar Thetrungal.
